description:
Hello, it`s been a while. It`s Uehara Ayuko.
It`s already episode 10. Nothing has changed in our everyday lives.
Just like when we first started school, Kanakana covered my eyes,
but I`m not who I used to be a few months ago!
I feel like I`ve almost gotten to the level of Saki-chan, who can dodge Kanakana.
Then again, not many people play "guess who?" at our age...
We tried to be like the rest of the female students in the world and talk about love, but apparently that was beyond our level...
Source: crunchyroll
